books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon, of “Bared to You,” continue to struggle to make their relationship work.
books.name: REFLECTED IN YOU

books.author: by J. K. Rowling
books.description: The sudden death of a parish councilman reveals bitter social divisions in an idyllic English town; a novel for adults by the creator of Harry Potter.
books.name: THE CASUAL VACANCY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers joins the hunt for a teenage Bonnie and Clyde.
books.name: MAD RIVER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Daunted by Christian’s dark secrets, Ana Steele ends their relationship, but desire still dominates her every thought; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Detective Zach Jordan and his beautiful partner (and ex-girlfriend) must stop a deranged killer who has targeted a glittering New York film festival.
books.name: NYPD RED

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: n Book 2 of the Century trilogy, members of five interrelated families from five countries grapple with the tumultuous historical events of the years 1939-49.
books.name: WINTER OF THE WORLD

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: A carload of people involved in a conspiracy pick up a disheveled hitchhiker, Child’s vigilante hero Jack Reacher.
books.name: A WANTED MAN

books.author: by M. Leighton
books.description: The life of a college student, home to help her father run his business, is turned upside down when she falls in love with twins.
books.name: DOWN TO YOU

books.author: by Hugh Howey
books.description: Contains the five Wool science fiction books about people who live underground in a dystopian world.
books.name: WOOL OMNIBUS EDITION

books.author: by David Mitchell
books.description: Six linked stories involve myriad characters and conflicts: from New Zealand in the mid-19th century with a stowaway Moriori, to a Belgian estate in the 1930s, to 1970s California with a plucky journalist.
books.name: CLOUD ATLAS

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: In the 23rd book in the Dark series, the Carpathian Dax fights a vampire and meets his life mate.
books.name: DARK STORM
